page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: There is no large amount of trade or industry in the area as it is mainly a farming area.(see under FARMING) There are a few haulage firms locally,the largest being based in Steeple Ashton:this was formerly agricultural haulage but is now general haulage. There are one or two small engineering firms dealing with both mechanical and agricultural repair work. In Steeple Ashton there is a small market garden and in Great Hinton there is a small nursery. There are several egg producing chicken farms in the area.
